If we had null values...
For example we suppose "Fiyat" has null values.
1. df.fiyat.fillna(value=df.fiyat.mean(),inplace=True)------- null values will be filled with average 
2. df.fiyat.fillna(value=df.fiyat.max(),inplace=True) ------- null values will be filled with max
3. df.fiyat.fillna(value=df.fiyat.min(),inplace=True) ------- null values will be filled with min
4. inplace=True--------Permanence is provided with this command.
